pullRequest.title: XRDDEV-881 API for listing approved timestamping services
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implement API for listing approved timestamping services.
Update OpenAPI description.
Add unit tests.

commit.message:
XRDDEV-881 API for listing approved timestamping services

- Implement API for listing approved timestamping services.
- Update OpenAPI description.
- Add unit tests.

nodes.bodyText:
The indentation seems to be 4 spaces instead of 2 in this part. The openapi doc should probably be indented consistently with 2 spaces.
I have noticed that editing yaml with IntelliJ IDEA makes it really really difficult to indent with 2 spaces so I have used other editors such as Sublime Text 3 or VSCode for that.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -3228,6 +3135,101 @@ paths:
           description: request specified an invalid format
         '500':
           description: internal server error
+
+  /timestamping-services:

nodes.bodyText: We have tried to avoid calling services from converters to keep them nicely decoupled and the codebase consistent. Maybe change the converter to use GlobalConfFacade and call the required facade methods directly (globalConfFacade.getApprovedTspName(globalConfFacade.getInstanceIdentifier(), url);)

commit.message:
XRDDEV-881 Refactor TimestampingServiceConverter based on review comments

- Remove dependency to TimestampingServiceService.
- Update tests.
